mapper.update: update app_reply set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_type = #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id_des = #{appIdDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb_media_id = #{thumbMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, page_path = #{pagePath,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
